title: Elegant girl or the drive for reliability
brief_description: A musical advertisement for the Vauxhall motor car. Makes a technical comparison between vintage and later model cars and shows the detailed testing the modern Vauxhall goes through to ensure its all-round quality and performance is at a maxiumum.
